import React, { useState } from 'react' ; import Helmet from 'react-helmet'; import useStyles from '../Requests/Request-jss'; import { WEBSITE_NAME } from '../../../utils/websiteData'; const Request = () => { const [ changeState , setChangeState] = useState( [ { name : 'Social aides' }, { name : 'Medical services' }, { name : 'Solidarity' }, { name : 'Others ' } ] ) ; const changeHandler = (event) => { if (event.target.value === 'Medical services' ){ setChangeState([ { name : 'aaaaaaaa' }, { name : 'bbbbbbbb' }, { name : 'cccccccc' }, { name : 'dddddddd' } ]) } } let value = '' ; const classes = useStyles() ; return ( <> {`${WEBSITE_NAME} | Add request`}

Add a Request

Ask for donation from your organization
{' '}
{/*
*/}
); } export default Request ;
